subject: Re: Excuse Me....
author: Misty
full_text:
Hello Katherine

Everyone is free to make up thier own minds as to whether spirits 
exist and whether they try to communicate using whatever means are 
available. It's a case of you believe it can work or you dont. Franks 
box is just one of many tools being used by researchers to gather 
data. As to what or who you are talking to, I think again that 
depends on which person you ask. 

Theres a wide cariety of people here who have had success using 
different methods. And also quite a few who would be more than happy 
to listen to your files. File type and file sizes are limited on this 
group so many have made use of other methods of posting such as 
posting wav files or larger files on esnips.com to share with the 
group. Yahoo groups have limited space so we ask people to make use 
of whats available.

Many here do not use franks box, or sweep tuning but for those who do 
I think they find it just as fascinating as recording regular EVP and 
often the information and the voices coming thru carry over into 
whatever method of choice they use. 

The best way to decide is always to try it for yourself. I think you 
may find a few skeptics who did just that and have been surprised 
with thier own results. You will also find a few who remain the 
skeptic. 

Good luck on your journey!

Misty
